title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files. When targeting .class files from injars, the source path is shown as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. It has also been observed that sometimes the filenames do not appear at all.
OB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. It has also been observed that sometimes the filenames do not appear at all, but these tests do not reproduce that problem.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
